**Codebase Exploration Summary**

This is a React + TypeScript portfolio application with the following key characteristics:

**Project Structure:**
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/` - Main source code
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/components/` - React components (blog, common, home, layout, projects)
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/pages/` - Page components (Home, Blog, Projects, About)
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/data/` - Static data (blog posts, projects)
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/styles/` - CSS and theme files
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/scripts/` - Build and utility scripts

**Tech Stack:**
- React 19 with TypeScript
- Vite for build tooling
- React Router for navigation
- Vitest + Testing Library for testing
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- GitHub Pages deployment

**Key Patterns:**
- Component-based architecture with separation by feature
- Data-driven content (blog posts and projects defined in `/src/data/`)
- Responsive design with mobile-first approach
- Comprehensive test coverage alongside components
